attributes.description:
Lindsay Saker has always been a part of your neighbourhood and a part of your life. We are South Africa's biggest Volkswagen, Audi, Select and Commercial vehicle dealer network.When you buy a Volkswagen, you know you are getting so much more than just a car. After Sales Service and support is the next stage in your journey. We are a committed dealer with world-class experts to ensure that you and your Volkswagen are always taken care of. We at Lindsay Saker Vereeniging is your dealer. 

We accept Trade We offer finance, all banks. All vehicles come with a Road worthy certificate, 80-Point check, Quality Valet
Price excludes any documentation fees and on road costs. . .

attributes.description: If you looking for quality Pre-Owned Vehicles no further.Our vehicles go through a i60-pont check quality check to ensure you are getting value for your money.Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.Delivery can be arranged nationwide.Price excludes admin and delivery fee.Finance can be arranged on premises and trade ins welcome.We at Motus ford Germiston strive for perfection,so every customer makes the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect car on our showroom floor.We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives,to help with all your vehicle requirements.

attributes.description: Motus Ford Kroonstad offers nationwide delivery to all of our valued customers as well as our very own Finance and Insurance Manager who is ready to help with finance at our dealership or over the phone for your CONVENIENCE in a matter of MINUTES with all 4 major banks. All of our vehicles come with a 160-point QUALITY Check meaning they check every part of the vehicle to make sure it is 101% Roadworthy as well as 101% PERFECT just for you! Please note that the price advertised excludes our Documentation, License and Delivery fees all at one standard price. Test Drives and Trade Ins are most certainly welcome.
